string.name: desc
string.value: Take to the skies to defeat Gelimer once and for all! Experience the tragic tale of the dark spirits, Lotus and Orchid.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tired of gaming alone? Join a guild today! Guilds have many benefits.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bored of simple training? Meet the bosses of Maple World via the Boss window!

string.name: desc
string.value: From Spell Traces to Star Force enhancements! Experience the many ways to grow powerful in MapleStory!

string.name: desc
string.value: On Star Planet, anybody and everybody can become a star! Enjoy mini games and events.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maple World's characters have come to life! What adventures lie beyond the closet?

string.name: desc
string.value: Head off to the Mushroom Castle to meet the most gorgeous of Maple World's inhabitants, Princess Violetta!

string.name: desc
string.value: Train the way you want! Customize your hunting grounds, from monsters to music!

string.name: desc
string.value: Reveal the secret history of Maple World at the Grand Athenaeum!

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Clear Cross World Party Quest 5 times

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Clear Cross World Party Quest 10 times

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Clear Cross World Party Quest 15 times

string.name: rewardDesc
string.value: Cross World Party Quest EXP Buff Coupon (30-min) x5

string.name: desc
string.value: A simple party hunt? NOPE! Enjoy it, cross world style. Clear 4 unique dungeons with players from many worlds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A moving, coming-of-level story about a champion Pink Bean in a Foreign World.\nThis masterpiece depicts Pink Bean's journey to reclaim his original, powerful form after finding himself stranded in a Foreign World.

string.name: desc
string.value: Winner takes all!\nChase and be chased! Let the Meat Race begin!

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Log in twice over the weekend

string.name: desc
string.value: Love blooms between two Maplers in one beautiful, shining moment. It's like a dream come true!

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Successfully use Powerful Rebirth Flame once.

string.name: desc
string.value: Improve yourself and become stronger than ever before.\nIt's the miraculous story of the Pink Bean who shocked the world!

string.name: subHead
string.value: Tragedy Strikes When a Pebble Becomes a Monster

string.name: rewardDesc
string.value: Title: Pink Bean the Dragon Slayer

string.name: desc
string.value: Genius detective Pink Bean lost his partner, Black Bean, in the Mystic Gate explosion. But Pink Bean knows it wasn't a simple terrorist act. Follow him as he tracks down the clues and discovers the truth!

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Obtain the Minar Forest Explorer title

string.name: completeNotify
string.value: Obtain The One Who's Touched the Sky title

string.name: subHead
string.value: A Moving Tale of Chief Explorer Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the greatest challenge ever attempted! Journey with Pink Bean on an expedition that climbs straight to the top. This inspiring test of endurance and perseverance is based on a true story!

string.name: subHead
string.value: Keep Friends Close and Enemies Closer

string.name: desc
string.value: A critically acclaimed story that paves the way for a whole new genre of Maple Movies. This edge-of-your-seat tale and cast of powerful characters support an unbelievable performance by Pink Bean. It's sure to enchant all who have the pleasure of viewing it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's been recruited as a secret agent thanks to his extraordinary talent. Now, to truly become one of the elite, he must complete a grueling training regimen. But to learn his final lesson, Pink Bean must defeat his greatest foe yet.

string.name: subHead
string.value: The Prince Who Loved a Human

string.name: desc
string.value: Of course, this is all still a work in progress. No one would have any idea what it is at this stage. I just film things I think are interesting and make a movie out of them!

string.name: subHead
string.value: Nobody Messes with a Hungry Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value: Of course, this is all still a work in progress. No one would have any idea what it is at this stage. I just film things I think are interesting and make a movie out of them!

string.name: subHead
string.value: Pink Bean's movie! It's a wrap!

string.name: subHead
string.value: Obtain the Temple of Time medal

string.name: rewardDesc
string.value: Pollo and Fritto Entry Ticket x5

string.name: subHead
string.value: Hunt 3,333 Churmble monsters on Eluna Prime

string.name: subHead
string.value: Reach Eluna Prospector Rank S 10 times

string.name: subHead
string.value: Use a cube to upgrade Potential to Epic or better one time
